result.title: Third street lighting Protocol & PDS & Annex A published
result.description: The task will draft the Protocol that will cover projects in street lighting. Street lighting projects are characterised by lamp and/or lighting control improvements in lighting. result.title: Instruments addressing technical and non-technical barriers - generic results
result.description: A report about the developed instruments at a generic level is given to serve other stakeholders (regional industrial communities, policy level, consortium-external parks, etc) as a reference for overcoming technical as well as non-technical barriers. The deliverable contains the non-confidential results of Tasks 2.1, and thereby provides guidance to a broader audience how to address respective barriers.

result.title: Project Website
result.description: Create and maintain a project web site on a .EU domain that will be regularly updated. The web site will offer general information about the project, its partners and H2020 Programme. It will inform about previous and forthcoming events and activities of the project as well as other relevant news on project topics. The EeDaPP website will be used for dissemination towards stakeholders and for public dissemination.
